import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

After you have [created](create.mdx) a
[native token](/introduction/stardust/explanations/what_is_stardust/tokenization#native-tokens),
you can easily send it by calling the `Wallet.send_native_tokens(params, options)` function.

As with any output, you can set [output unlock conditions](/introduction/stardust/explanations/what_is_stardust/unlock_conditions).
Keep in mind that if you set unlock conditions, whoever you send the native tokens to may need to claim them.

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">


1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Search the account's balance for a native token with a balance of at least `SEND_NATIVE_TOKEN_AMOUNT`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.rs#L40-L43
```

</div>

3. Prepare the outputs for the transaction by creating a new [`SendNativeTokensParams`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.SendNativeTokenParams.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.rs#L55-L58
```

</div>

4. Send the native tokens by calling the [`Wallet.send_native_tokens()`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.send_native_tokens)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.rs#L60
```

</div>

4. Await for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.rs#L63-L65
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Search the account's balance for a native token with a balance of at least `SEND_NATIVE_TOKEN_AMOUNT`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.ts#L42-L47
```

</div>

3. Prepare the outputs for the transaction by creating a new `SendNativeTokensParams`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.ts#L43-L48
```

</div>

4. Create the transaction that will send the tokens using the [`Wallet.sendNativeTokens()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#sendnativetokens)
   function,

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.ts#L57
```

</div>

5. Await for the [`Transaction`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md) to get confirmed by calling the
[`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#waitfortransactionacceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/burn.rs#L68-L70
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Search the account's balance for a native token with a balance of at least 10.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.py#L15-L17
```

</div>

3. Define the outputs for the transaction that will send the tokens by creating the `SendNativeTokensParams`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.py#L24-L30
```

</div>

4. Send the outputs from the previous step using the [`Wallet.send_native_tokens()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#send_native_tokens)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.py#L32
```

</div>

5. Await for the transaction to get accepted by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#wait_for_transaction_acceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.py#L35-L36
```

</div>
</TabItem>
</Tabs>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/send.py
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```plaintext
Balance before sending: 50
Transaction sent: 0x9a1ea93962b5d4ba3a27053f4727dcc95b29ee35dc85c43d9d6be4635ab10463
Block included: https://explorer.shimmer.network/testnet/block/0xb22cba455a3176ef62352f907b0fc5e5e49b4797563826141f8057cfa960a640
Balance after sending: 40
```
